name: IGI Spirit Frozen: Fighting Wi
description:
IGI Spirit Frozen: Fighting Winter is best world war2 rifleman first person and third person played as special sniper warrior role where you play the game in first person player shooter simulator of the military and you can witness all sorts of shooting guns to attack the enemy.
Features:
- Modern Equipment & up to date Weapons for Shooting.
- Different Gameplay Missions.
- Smooth & Easy Controls.
- Realistic Environment & Sounds.
- High quality 3D Graphics & Mode.
